string-array.name: meetDistributionsDescDishes
string-array.item: Each part of the meat in a separate dish for example: hands with separate dishes as well as each part of the sacrificial dish separately
Each dish contains a variety of different parts of the meat

string-array.name: meetDistributionsDescBags
string-array.item: Each part of the meat in a separate bag for example: the hands separate bags as well as each part of the sachet separate bags
Each bag contains a variety of different parts of the meat
